card_description: AkioSurvey.com is an online survey platform with a broad range of use cases such as satisfaction surveys, organizational surveys, market researches and 360° polls.
license1_Tier_features: ['Standard plan for 1 year', '2000 responses / month', 'Custom survey link', 'Custom survey themes', 'Survey password protection', 'Question and page branching', 'Response disqualification', 'Individual response export to XLS, CSV and PDF', 'Response summary export to XLS, CSV and PDF', 'Email customer support', 'Questionnaire templates']
About_all: ['AkioSurvey.com is an online survey platform with a broad range of use cases such as satisfaction surveys, organizational surveys, market researches and 360° polls.Creating an online survey with AkioSurvey is a trivial job thanks to its intuitive survey designer and survey templates. 14 question types help to ask respondents the right questions. Custom logo and color theme can be applied so the poll matches the organization’s branding. Branching is supported both on question and page levels.The online poll can be distributed by various channels including a custom web link, email, social media or the survey can be embedded directly into your web page. Responses can be disqualified based on a concrete condition. Answers can be deanonymized utilizing the respondent identification feature.The response review analysis provides data in real time. It is logically divided to two parts – the individual survey response review and the overall survey response summary. Both can be exported into XLS, CSV and PDF.Get access today!']

title: Flookup for Google Sheets
card_description: Flookup is a lightweight data cleaning add-on for Google Sheets. It uses a robust fuzzy matching algorithm to clean data in the following ways, regardless of spelling differences, partial matches or any other text-based differences in your data: + Highlight and remove fuzzy duplicates. + Lookup or m
license1_Tier_features: ['Process an unlimited amount of data iteratively', 'Lifetime updates at no extra charge', 'Platform-independent data processing', 'Best-in-class data processing algorithms']
About_all: ['Flookup is a lightweight data cleaning add-on for Google Sheets.It uses a robust fuzzy matching algorithm to clean data in the following ways, regardless of spelling differences, partial matches or any other text-based differences in your data:+ Highlight and remove fuzzy duplicates.+ Lookup or merge fuzzy data.+ Extract unique values from fuzzy duplicates.+ Determine percentage similarities between text entries.+ Remove unwanted words, diacritics and punctuation marks.Flookup functions are not affected by the sort order of your data or the letter case of the text entries you are analysing.It will not only help you improve efficiency, reduce your error rate and increase productivity, but it will also help you save big on revenue expenditure.DID YOU KNOW?The 1-10-100 principle states that it only costs $1 to verify the quality of your database, $10 to clean each item in it and $100 to retain each item that is not cleaned. 📌This means that using Flookup to clean just 100 rows of data (with 20 of them dirty and 80 of them clean but in need of verification) will cause you to save $225! 🤗On the other hand, ignoring this data will eventually cost you anything between $1,000 to $10,000! 😨']

', 'Introducing Logic Sheet: a data-processing add-on for Google Sheets that lets you do all kinds of data processing tasks with one click right in your Google Sheet. No more copy/pasting and coding. ', 'A typical data-analysis task involves three steps: data collection, data cleaning, and data analyzing. With Logic Sheet, you can do them all in only one tool. ', 'In the data collection process, you can use Logic Sheet to import data from external sources into Google Sheets. That includes importing data from API, databases, or webpages.\xa0', 'In the data cleaning stage, you can use Logic Sheet to remove incorrect or superfluous data, as well as check for incompleteness or inconsistencies. title: eBook: The Mindset of a Good Negotiator
card_description: Negotiation is prevalent and universal, and everyone needs to negotiate sooner or later. Entrepreneurs face an even harder challenge, dealing with negotiations from an inferior position. This handbook focuses on improving the set of values of negotiators that want to achieve longer-lasting agreement
license1_Tier_features: ['Features topics such as the need to negotiate, dealing with aggressiveness and lies and deception', 'Follows the negotiation and offers guidelines to each part of the process', 'Gives advice on proper planning values and fallacies', 'Discusses the communication, but also the substance of the messages that negotiators exchange', 'Tackles the agreements and how to create them in a sustainable way']
About_all: ["Negotiation is prevalent and universal, and everyone needs to negotiate sooner or later. Entrepreneurs face an even harder challenge, dealing with negotiations from an inferior position.This handbook focuses on improving the set of values of negotiators that want to achieve longer-lasting agreements. It is important, as most business negotiations revolve around creating or maintaining a working relationship between parties, either in procurement or sales. This book accomplishes this by discussing the core principles of good negotiators, and how can these improve and expand the outcome of negotiations. The results? Less conflict and better contracts that save time and reduce business costs.There are lots of books with actionable content in the form of techniques, strategies and tactics to be used in various negotiations, but without the right mindset, even the best tools will not work the way they should.'The Mindset of a Good Negotiator' contains the focused knowledge stemming from working and interacting with businesses, authors, negotiaton experts, diplomats, trainers and practitioners over the past 10 years.Intent on mastering your negotiation abilities by creating healthy habits and a winning mindset? Then get your copy of 'The Mindset of a Good Negotiator' today!"]

title: WorkStart: Self Assessments
card_description: The big 5 personality test follows the Five-Factor Model, an empirical-based theory in psychology that evaluates five overarching dimensions of personality: openness, conscientiousness, extroversion, agreeableness, and emotional stability. The model has been shaped by the work of various researchers
license1_Tier_features: ['25 Big 5 personality assessments', 'Ideal for teams and/or recruiters', 'Dashboard summary with team view', 'Applicant Tracking Kanban Board', 'Add your own custom questions for your team to complete before the Big 5 assessment', 'Users get their own individual assessments']
About_all: ['The big 5 personality test follows the Five-Factor Model, an empirical-based theory in psychology that evaluates five overarching dimensions of personality: openness, conscientiousness, extroversion, agreeableness, and emotional stability.The model has been shaped by the work of various researchers over three decades who analyzed verbal descriptors of human behavior.  The "Big 5 Model of Personality" is the most well-known personality test because it\'s the most scientifically-studied.It is used in schools, universities, employment areas, and even in prisons. The Work Start Big Five Personality Assessment is a tool for people to understand themselves and others.This assessment measures personality traits and behavioral characteristics, which have a large influence on who you are personally and professionally.• Provides insights into the characteristics that influence your behavior at work and at home.• Helps you understand yourself, appreciate your strengths, learn how to improve your weaknesses and get along better with others.• Learn how your personality impacts your job performance and satisfaction.• Helps you understand the personality characteristics that influence your behavior at work and at home.']

title: Happy Team
card_description: The simplest way to keep a pulse on your team's mental health and well-being.
license1_Tier_features: ['Up to 1000 team seats', 'Access to all reports (any new ones we add)', 'Unlimited survey sends', 'Custom branding and email content']
About_all: ["Built for managers and leaders to ensure their organization is seen and heard.At HappyTeam, we believe an organization's employees should hold greater value than the product of their output, and that happy employees are those that not only feel seen but heard. We've seen many companies fail here, and the ones that are trying, we think, can do better.When it comes to team member's well-being, we often see orgs deploy anonymous quarterly surveys to get a pulse. These can be helpful but we believe the insights are coming too late. With HappyTeam, you'll be able to capture a team member's happiness score through single-response anonymous email surveys (sent out daily or weekly – it's up to you). We then crunch the numbers and display them elegantly through visual graphs in your team dashboard – giving you and your team members insight by day, week, department, and more."]

This deal is for you!Ideal Resume is a browser-based resume & CV optimization platform. Over 70% of resumes submitted are never seen by a hiring manager. That’s because many companies rely on automated software known as applicant tracking systems (ATS) to collect & rank the resumes they receive. Think of these rankings like Google search results, but for resumes. You want to rank on the first page of Google for significant web traffic. Similarly, a resume needs to rank near the top of a hiring manager's ATS dashboard to get noticed. Ideal Resume helps you knock the socks off these resume screening robots & rank higher!Instantly score your resume (or client's resume) to any job description using the same criteria as an employer's ATS. Identify opportunities to enhance the resume & boost its score to the 70% or higher sweet spot. Start creating ATS optimized resumes today!"]

Even you have data with millions of records, you can use split feature to export your data to a bunch
license1_Tier_features: ['Text Data Reader']
About_all: ['Text Data Reader is an MS Windows desktop application for quick viewing and exporting organized text data such as .CSV or .TXT (catalogs for example) with different field separators to Excel format. Even you have data with millions of records, you can use split feature to export your data to a bunch of Excel files.Do it in several simple steps:1. Click right mouse button on file with your data2. Choose "Open with" -> "Text Data Reader"3. Choose field separator on main window: tab, comma, semicolon, and many other variants4. See your data5. Now you can do search on it or export it to ExcelIf you have a giant file with hundreds or even thousands of lines (or even millions) you probably know that Excel works slow with such a large amount of data, though it works fine with data under 100k lines. Just split your file. Press three dots near "to Excel" button and export to a bunch of Excel files.Our help section contains a video example of this process as well.Get access now!']

About_all: ['Pitchroom is a secure branded data room with file, document, video support that can be set up in minutes.', 'Pitchroom was founded to secure investor materials that were being shared with potential investors.', 'At the time, the founders could only find really expensive virtual data rooms out on the market, so they set about changing that.', 'They needed to protect their materials and at the same time enable analytics so they had insight into when users were engaging with that content.', 'With Pitchroom, you can create a data room in seconds and completely customize it with sidebar images, logos, and a unique URL.', 'Upload files, folders, videos, or documents, and then select whether you want the room displayed with thumbnails (presentation mode) or folder list (VDR mode).', 'Now select access credentials, share your unique URL, and monitor the audit trail for engagements, usage, and analytics.', 'If you wish to guard business-sensitive documents or video, Pitchroom is an easy and inexpensive deal that you won’t want to pass up.', 'Get lifetime access to Pitchroom now!']

About_all: ['CrozTop is a powerful remote sales platform that turns your website into a live, tool-rich conference so you can close hot leads on the spot.', 'eCommerce to date has been a huge boost to productivity and cost reduction for those companies that can have their customers self-assist in their own purchases.', 'But where are the productivity-boosting web tools for those industries or customers that require a sales agent to assist in a purchase?', 'CrozTop is the answer; it is a new way of transacting online where the website IS the conversion funnel.\xa0It is the video conference, the lead scorer, the whiteboard, the quote builder, the electronic signature, the appointment maker, the file sharing, the pitch presentation, and more.', 'Rather than having to call back a customer from an email form to convert them, CrozTop integrates the web conference into the website, gives the agent one-click sharing access to all the company’s sales videos, brochures, products and services, contracts, and more.', 'All of this happens via the agent portal, and it allows cross-interactivity of sales tools without the visitor ever having to abandon their original web browsing session.', 'Get access to CrozTop now!']
